text.section: In this part the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Commercialization" means the process of introducing a new product or technology into the market.
"Corporation" means the Maryland Technology Development Corporation.
"Fund" means the Maryland Innovation Initiative Fund established under § 10-457 of this part.
"Initiative" means the Maryland Innovation Initiative established under § 10-455 of this part.
"Participating members" means the representatives described in § 10-455(b) of this part.
"Qualifying university" means a public or private university that meets the requirements set forth under § 10-455(c) of this part.
"Technology transfer" means the process of converting scientific and technological advances into marketable goods and services.
"University" means a not-for-profit, research university located in Maryland.
